newsitem.title: INDONESIA: Astra to launch four new models.
newsitem.headline: Astra to launch four new models.

text.p: Indonesian automobile maker PT Astra International said on Wednesday it will launch a compact Asia Family Car in the first quarter of 1998 with 40 percent local components.
"We will launch the Asia Family Car (AFC) in the first quarter 1998," finance director Rini Suwandi told reporters after the annual shareholders meeting.
Suwandi said the car would be produced by Toyota Astra Motor, a joint venture between Japan's Toyota Motor and Astra and would be marketed in the region, not only the domestic market.
In 1998, the company planned to launch two new models of Daihatsu sedans and one new model of an Isuzu car, she said.
However, Suwandi declined to indicate the price range and any likely impact on Astra's earnings.
